Author: thieh

Comment: >Asked what Putin is doing now to help forge a peace deal, Trump responded, “stopping taking the whole country, pretty big concession.”  He finally said it!! I've been waiting for this. I kept wondering what concessions the trump admin was asking russia to make. I didn't see any answer until now. Finally, he says the quiet part out loud: russia doesn't have to make any concessions.  The worst part of the "at least russia isn't taking over the entire country" thing is that there's nothing stopping russia from taking over the entire country at a later time. So even if russia were to agree to a "peace deal" now, it would just be temporary until they're ready to resume their invasion and take over all of Ukraine. And remember, if they were to get all of Ukraine, they'd be in a great position to invade more countries.  So idk, maybe arming Ukraine as much as possible would be a good idea?

Comment: Ukraine for their size kicked the living shit out of Putin's Russia. Their unique battlefield use of strategic drone and missiles use has revolutionized warfare going forward. The EU and it's allies will continue to support Ukraine til the end. Putin's Russia is in shambles. Their infrastructure outside of Moscow and St Petersburg is third world at best. Their energy, tech, auto, and airline industries are in shambles. They've lost a majority of their best tanks and air defense systems. They can't even keep their Navy in the Black Sea. The place has turned into a dump. Ukraine and Europe will prevail.
Author: williamgman
